data.description:
ACE HANDSET AND SUBSCRIPTION REQUIRED

Ace delivers an unmatched shooting experience for players of all ability levels. Hone your practical shooting skills, compete with friends in multiplayer, or blast zombies from all angles.

Compatible with the Quest 2 and 3 Controllers, the stunningly realistic Ace Handset emulates the size, weight, trigger pull, and magazine release feel of a real handgun to provide you with an unparalleled shooting experience. Get your Ace Handset and Subscription today at www.AceXR.com

SHARPEN YOUR SKILLS

Dozens of practical shooting stages, drills for fundamentals, and instant feedback to help you improve. 

EXPERIENCE NEW THRILLS

Engage drones in a 360 degree field of fire. Run and gun on the move. Defend your position from zombies with friends. With a wide variety of handguns, optics, and game modes, Ace provides a fun challenge for everyone. 

COMPETE IN MULTIPLAYER

Earn a spot on the Drill Leaderboard. Win in-game currency from pop-up matches. Compete live with friends in multiplayer. 

SHOOT WITH REALISM

Built by shooters, made for everyone.  Ace incorporates authentic ballistics and physics bringing realistic shooting to a platform anyone can enjoy.

App Privacy

Get info about what data this app developer may request or have access to.
